entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add CancellationToken to WebAuthenticator #26137
  • Templates missing Localization #26136
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix Cleanup code on CollectionView #26134
  • No name is provided for "checkboxes", "clear" and "New Task" button: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Name Role Value. #26128
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • The keyboard requires an additional stroke to move to the next control from the Graph: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_FocusOrder. #26127
  • MAUI source generator interferes with other projects #26125
  • Project Section is not accessible using the keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Project_Keyboard. #26124
  • Add TryGetValue() to IPreferences #26123
  • HybridWebView crashes Maui App built with .Net 9.0.1 GA / Windows on ARM / 23H2 #26116
    Backlog
  • Shell.TitleView is not replacing the Shell.Title on iOS 18 iPad only. #26114

Closed

  • IL2026 Trim warning from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SourceGen.CodeBehindGenerator #26115
  • iOS BackButton Title cannot be set to string.Empty or "" #25742
    Backlog
  • In the component Entry, ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" doesn't work. #25225
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] I4_ Selection - The default items not highlight in Single Pre-selection and Multiple Pre-selection Page #23299
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.2.9373] Setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView on Windows throws NullReferenceException #18452
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [WinUI] App TitleBar overlapping on .NET9 when using Modals #25964
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Preferences DateTime Storage Issues #25930
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Images do not load in CollectionView template in ARM processor #26118
  • [9.0 GA, Android] ScrollView starts at the position of first Entry control on the bottom rather than at 0 #25829
    .NET 9 SR1.1

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] - Fix for Shell Section Visibility changes not reflected until Tab switch #26130
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Unable to Remove Thumb Image in Slider Control #26129
    community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • 25534- Fix for Application crash on setting icon on toolbar item #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Make MauiAppCompatEditText public & adapt EntryHandler #26121
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • [Testing] Fix randomly failing tests on CI #26120
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [X] Make OnPlatformExtension and OnIdiomExtension trim-compatible #26119
    area-xaml

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 9 #25815
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Remove code that enables/disables Editor #26122
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed the iOS BackButton title does not update when set to an empty string or whitespace #25813
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 13 #25954
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #26132
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25886
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement themes change in Appium actions on Windows #25863
    area-testing
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Implement PressEnter Appium action in Catalyst #25854
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26071
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-titlebar, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fall back to loading .NET 8 date strings #26033
    area-essentials, .NET 9 SR2
  • Remove Legacy Gallery from SLNs #26068
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #26108
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #26109
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [Android] Fix RadioButton using ContentPresenter not rendering #26110
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26111
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Update Versions.props to 9.011 SR 1.1 #26112
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] Remove code that enables/disables Entry #26107
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Remove code that enables/disables Entry #26101
    .NET 9 SR1.1

Updated

  • Update Windows SDK projection for testing #25781
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Always propagate the BC to the ControlTemplate #26072
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • TableView title issue fix on windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 19 #26100
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2792.45` to `1.0.2903.40` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Windows] Disable HitTest when showing EmptyView on CollectionView #26006
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix for DatePicker displays incorrect date selection when navigating to next month. #26064
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [iOS] Fixed the RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not firing issue in CollectionView #26067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [SECURITY] `Microsoft.Sbom.Targets` nuget for package SBOM #26093
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Testing] Added ToggleSystemAnimations method to Appium helper methods #26096
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 18 #26097
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Encoding webview's source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix Android FlyoutPage crash when changing orientation of tablet #24394
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Editor and ScrollView problems in iOS #26024
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, area-controls-editor
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
